message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't be serious with 50/50, I'll give you a decent offer
80 for me? That's too greedy! I'll give you a chance to be more generous.
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll take 60, you can have 40.
You're still being too generous, I'll take 60, you can have 40, but I'm not giving you 60
70 for you? That's still too much! I'll give you a chance to be more realistic.
You're being too stingy, Bob! I'll take 55, you can have 45. That's the best I'm willing to offer.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not budging much
85 for you? That's outrageous! I'm not falling for it.
Last chance, Bob. I'll take 52, you can have 48. Let's end this.
